document.title: Introduction
document.paragraph:
1Introduction This section of the documentation describes preferences that belong to the "Graphical elements" category. This group contains two kinds of properties, some related to the way
10_texts_display_preferences.xml texts are displayed in EiffelStudio, others that define which
20_discardable_dialogs.xml dialog windows should not be displayed. You can also decide to use animated icons in the status bars whenever possible (that is, during compilations and executions).
